summary:
Chelsea F.C. is an English professional soccer team from West London. They play in the Premier League, the country's top division. Founded in 1905, they've won many titles, including the English League championship, FA Cup, and European cups. Chelsea is one of the few clubs to have won all three main European competitions twice. They've also won the FIFA Club World Cup.

Locally, they rival Arsenal and Tottenham, and historically, Leeds United. Chelsea is valued at $3.13 billion, making it one of the world's most valuable and highest-earning football clubs.
title: Chelsea F.C.
